text:
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
October 14, 1959
COPY
Mr. William G. Harley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Radio Station
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
Because of emergency developments in connection with new
projects, I find I must cancel my plans for attending your conÂ¬
vention in Detroit from October 27 to 30. I have written to the
hotel. This action is a very reluctant one, for I looked forward
to meeting with you and your colleagues and hearing more about
your program.
I know you will have a fine convention, and I certainly wish
for you and your colleagues a pleasant experience.
Sincerely,
Maurice F. Seay
MFS:jf
cc: Dr. Harry J. Skornia
